data.name: H1Z1: Just Survive - Manitoba Cosmetic Skin Pack
data.detailed_description:
You live a tough life. You need tough stuff. Whether you're knee deep in mud or splattered with blood, you'll find our fabrics wash clean thanks to our patented fiber treatment process. Get Dirty with Manitoba Today.

The Manitoba Cosmetic pack contains 5 cosmetic skins that can be applied to your character’s in-game appearance in H1Z1: Just Survive. Check out the other Just Survive Cosmetic packs and look for more personalization items found in crates in Just Survive. The H1Z1: Just Survive base game and a free Daybreak Account is required to purchase this pack.

data.short_description: You live a tough life.  You need tough stuff.  Whether you're knee deep in mud or splattered with blood, you'll find our fabrics wash clean thanks to our patented fiber treatment process.  Get Dirty with Manitoba Today.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i3 Dual-Core with Hyper-Threading (required)
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 275 series or higher / AMD Radeon HD 4870 X2 series or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad Core or higher / AMD Phenom II X6 or higher
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 960 series or higher / AMD Radeon R9 280X series or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card
